net.xylophones.micro.game.mb.mvc.board
Interface BoardListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface BoardListener

Interface which should be implemented by classes which want to receive notification of events from the BoardModel

Author:
william@xylophones.net

          A block has landed
